title: new ignored warnings: ResourceWarning: unclosed file upon import of datalad
body:
Just ran into while testing #5964 .

Seems to not happen on `maint` but does happen on master:

```shell
$> DATALAD_LOG_LEVEL=1 python -Werror -c 'import datalad.version as m;print(m.__version__)'
[Level 5] Instantiating ssh manager 
[Level 5] Done importing main __init__ 
0.14.7+607.g39352a6d7
[Level 5] Exiting 
Exception ignored in: <_io.FileIO name=3 mode='rb' closefd=True>
ResourceWarning: unclosed file <_io.FileIO name=3 mode='rb' closefd=True>
Exception ignored in: <_io.FileIO name=5 mode='rb' closefd=True>
ResourceWarning: unclosed file <_io.FileIO name=5 mode='rb' closefd=True>

$> DATALAD_LOG_LEVEL=1 python -c 'import datalad.version as m;print(m.__version__)'        
[Level 5] Instantiating ssh manager 
[Level 5] Done importing main __init__ 
0.14.7+607.g39352a6d7
[Level 5] Exiting 
```
so might be of no consequence (since not shown whenever not -Werror or -Wonce, but IMHO should not happen

<details>
<summary>none on `maint`</summary> 

```shell
$> DATALAD_LOG_LEVEL=1 python -Werror -c 'import datalad.version as m;print(m.__version__)'
[Level 5] Instantiating ssh manager 
[Level 5] Done importing main __init__ 
0.14.7+41.gdfdd35270
[Level 5] Exiting 
```
</details>
